name: How BOB Dies
description:
FEATURES AND STUFF LIKE THAT

  • 60+ unique voice lines from The Narrator.
  • 2 major endings, and many more minor endings.
  • Play as BOB and trust that your friend playing as the crane will actually help you, so that you can escape the factory.
  • Play as the crane to help BOB escape the factory, by building platforms, holding blocks, or be a menace and kill BOB over and over.
  • Note: the game can be beat with 1 player, though it is intended to be played with a friend, or someone who isn't a friend, or someone who won't be friends after playing this.

STORY

This is the story of how BOB dies. BOB is a standard factory worker bot that moves broken products off the supply line, and into the incinerator, with his best friend, the crane. But one day, something quite odd happened, something that should not have happened. He had been moving boxes of expired orange juice when miraculously, BOB had gained free will and independence, and decides to find an exit leading to the outside. What he could not have realized is that a series of events will eventually lead to one of his many painful death, but nonetheless, BOB was determined to escape the factory and see the sun.

HOW TO PLAY REMOTELY

  1. Both players should download Parsec from parsec.app
  2. Make an account, and then share your sharing link with friend.
  3. Give the friend keyboard and (or) mouse privileges.
  4. Play How BOB Dies remotely!
